item.title: Mortal Kombat 1’s Sequel Already Has Some Obvious Contenders To Lead Its Story
item.description:
For over 30 years, the Mortal Kombat franchise has introduced a wide variety of playable fighters throughout its many games’ rosters. From the secret green ninja Reptile to the bug-like D'Vorah, new fighters brought new gameplay mechanics and story developments to each game. While many would not return due to being unpopular among fans, most fighters have had brief moments in Mortal Kombat ’s narrative spotlight. Several underutilized classic characters got their chance in the spotlight as the main characters in Mortal Kombat 1 , such as Kenshi, Ashrah, and Geras.

However, this game may have already set up the next cast of fighters to play major roles in the eventual Mortal Kombat 2 in the form of the Kameo Fighters. Mortal Kombat 1 ’s Kameo Fighter Roster currently includes:

  • Sub-Zero
  • Shujinko
  • Scorpion
  • Motaro
  • Kung Lao
  • Cyrax
  • Frost
  • Goro
  • Jax
  • Kano
  • Darrius
  • Sareena
  • Sektor
  • Sonya
  • Stryker
  • Tremor
  • Khameleon
  • Janet Cage
  • Mavado
  • Ferra

Mortal Kombat 1’s Kameo Fighters Explained

Designed as a new gameplay mechanic to support player expression while allowing players to keep using their preferred fighter, Kameo Fighters are secondary, non-playable fighters that can be occasionally used to help fight or defend against opponents. Kameo Fighters can additionally aid in furthering a string of combo attacks and perform Breakers and Fatal Blows against enemies. While they’re more difficult to achieve than using main roster fighters, Kameo Fighters can also be used to pull off unique Brutalities and Fatalities based on their classic finishing moves from older Mortal Kombat games. However, unlike the main roster, Kameo Fighters can only be cosmetically customized with alternate palettes for their outfits.

Mortal Kombat 1 currently features 20 Kameo Fighters with more expected to be added alongside fighters in Kombat Pack 2 and other future DLC. Many Kameo Fighters are based on original incarnations of classic characters rather than their new timeline iterations such as classic Scorpion, Kung Lao, and Sektor. However, most Kameo Fighters are new versions of other, previously playable characters in Titan Liu Kang’s timeline, with many appearing in Mortal Kombat 1 ’s base campaign and Khaos Reigns expansion, such as Darrius, Goro, and Khameleon. Only one Kameo Fighter is known to be from an as yet unplayable timeline, with that fighter being the gender-swapped Janet Cage.

Kameo Fighter’s Protagonist Potential in Mortal Kombat 2

The implementation of Kameo Fighters had a mixed reception from several Mortal Kombat fans, with many requesting for the mechanic to be optional or suggesting Kameo Fighters be made into fully-fledged playable fighters. Despite this divisive reaction, NetherRealm studios still intends to utilize Kameo Fighters for the rest of Mortal Kombat 1 ’s lifetime, though it’s currently unknown if the mechanic will return in future games. Nevertheless, NetherRealm could use Kameo Fighters as the basis for new protagonists in the inevitable Mortal Kombat 2 alongside returning main fighters from Mortal Kombat 1 such as Liu Kang, Scorpion, and Noob Saibot.

Two possible leading Kameo Fighters in Mortal Kombat 2 could be the Special Forces operatives Sonya Blade and Jackson Briggs. Earthrealm’s militaristic Special Forces notably lacked a major role in Mortal Kombat 1 ’s campaign, but they could play leading roles in aiding the opposition of General Shao’s Outworld rebellion. Liu Kang does conceal Johnny Cage’s fate with Sonya Blade in a pre-battle dialogue sequence, so their relationship could blossom in the future sequel. Frost may also play a leading role as Noob Saibot and Sektor’s champion against the Shirai Ryu, while the brown Earth-powered ninja Tremor could aid Scorpion rather than helping Black Dragon mercenaries as in prior timelines.

Kameo Fighters Potential Pivotal Roles

Numerous hints throughout Mortal Kombat 1 ’s campaign, tower endings, and pre-battle dialogue sequences suggest that the Dragon King Onaga may be the next primary antagonist for Mortal Kombat 2 . If Onaga does become a proper endgame boss once more, Shujinko may have to step up in Liu Kang’s timeline to defeat the Dragon King again. In Mortal Kombat ’s original timeline, Onaga was resurrected in the body of Reptile, but Mortal Kombat 2 could mix this plot point up a bit by having the Dragon King possess Khameleon instead, as both she and Reptile are Zaterrans. Given that Onaga currently resides in Outworld’s Mount Tsaagan, Ferra may play a pivotal role in either aiding or combating the Dragon King.

item.title: 10 Hardest Achievements To Get In Genshin Impact
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Completing the Hyperblooming Circus achievement requires carefully assembling a team and defeating 4 opponents with Hyperbloom in 2 seconds for 35 Primogems.
  • Defeating the Unusual Hilichurl 75 times for the Well, That Was Strange achievement can be tedious without guides due to its unique appearance and moves.
  • To complete the Tales Of Monstrous Madness achievement, players must find 10 RNG-dependent pages by fishing in Inazuma, making it a frustrating and time-consuming task.

Genshin Impact is currently home to 1,365 achievements, a number that is only set to increase with future updates. Players can showcase their expertise and experience in the game by completing these achievements, with a lot of them often being hidden.

However, there are certain achievements that are hard to do, or extremely time-consuming, so investing resources in getting the achievement becomes a challenge in itself. The Genshin Impact achievements that have made it onto this list are truly some of the hardest and take unwavering dedication and focus to complete.

10 Hyperblooming Circus

Kill Enemies With Hyperbloom

  • Achievement Category: Elemental Specialist: Series II
  • Requirements: Defeat four opponents with Hyperbloom within two seconds (1/5/10)
  • Total Rewards: 35 Primogems

While Hyperbloom team comps are very popular in Genshin Impact, getting four kills with this reaction in a short span of time is much trickier than it might seem. Players will have to carefully assemble a team that can proc Hyperbloom in a rotation where it is able to land the finishing blow.

This is easier said than done against high-level enemies. Doing this a total of 16 times to complete all three tiers of the achievement is definitely tedious. The best way to achieve this feat is to form a team consisting of Electro Traveler, Barbara, and Collei and fight low-level enemies to make sure Hyperbloom can reliably kill them.

9 Well, That Was Strange

Defeat Unusual Hilichurls

  • Achievement Category: Challenger: Series II
  • Requirements: Defeat the Unusual Hilichurl (1/20/50)
  • Total Rewards: 35 Primogems

The Unusual Hilichurl has been a part of Genshin Impact since Version 1.1. As its name suggests, it is a strange-looking Hilichurl that takes on a very different look compared to its kin. It also has a variety of moves that are not usually part of a Hilichurl's arsenal. These include smacking a player with its briefcase and throwing cabbages.

Defeating the Unusual Hilichurl is not the hardest part. It is to find it 75 times in order to complete the three tiers of the achievement. It spawns every 12 hours in real-time and can be defeated twice before going on cooldown. Finding these locations without a guide can be done only through exploration. Even with some tips, it is quite tedious and definitely one of the harder achievements to obtain in the game.

8 Dear Daddy

Hear Timmie's Story

  • Achievement Category: Wonders of the World
  • Requirements: Complete "A Boy's Letter"
  • Total Rewards: 5 Primogems

Dear Daddy is an achievement that can only be completed after getting a specific version of the Mondstadt commission named "Pigeons Go AWOL". Acquiring this particular version of the commission, involving the Hilichurls, will take a good amount of RNG, which naturally makes this achievement hard to obtain.

It is further made hard as the letter that is needed to activate the next quest, "A Boy's Letter", is based on luck and will not spawn even if you get the Hilichurl version of Pigeons Go AWOL. This is an achievement that players can achieve relatively quickly or take ages to complete.

7 Perfectionist

Help Tsarevich Out

  • Achievement Category: Snezhnaya Does Not Believe in Tears: Series I
  • Requirements: Complete all of Tsarevich's commissions flawlessly in "Reliable Helper"
  • Total Rewards: 5 Primogems

Tsarevich is a top contender for the most hated NPC in Genshin Impact purely because of his commission "Reliable Helper". This commission can be obtained by setting the region to Mondstadt. The catch with this achievement is that players will have to do the three variants of this commission flawlessly, which is quite hard.

These are the three variants of the commission and the requirements to complete it flawlessly:

  • Mountaintop: Defeat the Blazing Axe Mitachurl, Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl, and the Anemo Samachurl in order
  • Foot of the mountains: Defeat the enemies and report to Tsarevich within a minute
  • Mountainside: Do not destroy any of the crates

Messing up any of these will result in a flawed completion, after which players will have to wait for the commission to return, which is dependent on an internal cycle. This is a troublesome achievement that can take a really long time if things don't go right.

6 Divine Roots

Explore Every Corner of Inazuma

  • Achievement Category: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I
  • Requirements: Reach the maximum level of the Sacred Sakura's Favor
  • Total Rewards: 20 Primogems

Getting to Level 50 of the Sacred Sakura's Favor takes an immense amount of exploration and grinding. Players will need a grand total of 1,250 Electro Sigils to obtain this achievement. Needless to say, players will have to explore almost every island in Inazuma to its fullest.

Inazuma features some of the toughest exploration for newer players that do not have well-equipped teams. It is also home to some frustrating and mind-numbing puzzles that can test anyone's patience. This is easily one of the most time-consuming and tedious achievements to complete in Genshin Impact.

5 Culmination Of The Great Dream

Traverse The Rainforest And The Desert

  • Achievement Category: Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore
  • Requirements: Reach the maximum level of the Tree of Dreams
  • Total Rewards: 20 Primogems

If leveling up the Sacred Sakura Favor was not hard enough already, making the Tree of Dreams in Vanarana reach Level 50 is even harder thanks to Sumeru's vast landscape. While the puzzles in this region are not as hard as the ones in Inazuma, it is quite cumbersome to explore so much land across the rainforest and the desert.

Add the plethora of underground sections into the mix and players can find themselves completely overwhelmed. This is an achievement that is best done in a step-by-step process, as it can take a good chunk of time to complete a lot of the important world quests and unlock devices needed to reach particular sub-areas in the region.

4 Bounty Of The Earth

Complete Ley Line Outcrops

  • Achievement Category: The Hero's Journey
  • Requirements: Collect rewards from blossoms of revelations or wealth (200/400/800)
  • Total Rewards: 35 Primogems

Completing Ley Line Outcrops is a great way to spend Resin in Genshin Impact , when there is nothing else to do. Getting free gold or experience books is the premier way to pre-farm for future character banners or ascend existing characters. However, this achievement requires players to complete 1400 Ley Line Outcrops, which is absurd.

Players will not usually be spending all their Resin on Ley Lines every day, which makes this achievement incredibly time-consuming. Additionally, spending Condensed Resin to get double rewards only counts as one Ley Line Outcrop completed. All of these factors make Bounty of the Earth an achievement that will take a couple of months to a few years depending on the player's choices.

3 Tales Of Monstrous Madness

Finish The Toki Alley Tales

  • Achievement Category: Wonders of the Worlds
  • Requirements: Collect the entire "Toki Alley Tales" series.
  • Total Rewards: 5 Primogems

Tales of Monstrous Madness continues a series of achievements that takes an ungodly amount of time to complete. Finding the first 50 enigmatic pages of Inazuma requires exploring the islands of the nation. The hard part comes into play while trying to collect the final 10 enigmatic pages required to obtain the achievement.

These 10 pages are purely dependent on RNG, as players can only get them by fishing in Inazuma. There is no guarantee involved in this process, and it can take incredibly long to obtain the final 10 pages. This is one of the few achievements that is quite frustrating and is often not worth the hassle unless players are heavily invested in Genshin Impact's lore.

2 Ding Ding Ding!

Become A Fishing Expert

  • Achievement Category: Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I
  • Requirements: Catch fish successfully (100/500/2000)
  • Total Rewards: 35 Primogems

Fishing is one of the least used features in Genshin Impact. Other than obtaining some strong craftable weapons like The Catch, or simply relaxing for a while, there is very little use for this gameplay mechanic.

This is why catching 2600 fish is borderline impossible for many players, as they simply won't have the patience or time to commit so many resources to an inconsequential mechanic that barely gives out worthwhile rewards. This achievement is comfortably one of the hardest and most drawn out in the game.

1 Stop! Gather Time

A True Gardener

  • Achievement Category: A Realm Beyond: Series III
  • Requirements: Gather items in "A Path of Value: Orderly Meadow" (40/200/800)
  • Total Rewards: 35 Primogems

Much like the "Ding Ding Ding!" achievement, Stop! Gather Time suffers from the same problem of being too long to invest time in a measly 35 Primogems. The fact that this achievement takes up to a minimum of 7000 hours is mind-boggling.

This is easily the hardest achievement to obtain in Genshin Impact. The lack of rewards, except for local specialties, makes this journey almost pointless except for dedicated players looking to get every single achievement in the game.

item.title: Transform VS Sword Simulator Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Transform VS Sword Simulator is a Roblox game that is essentially a simplified version of an RPG with dungeons. Hundreds of battles await you here, giving you the opportunity to level up, increase your stats, and upgrade your weapons. The levels in the game are repetitive and do not differ much, so you can simply turn on the automatic mode and go do other things. To get more EXP and gold during this time, you can redeem Transform VS Sword Simulator codes and get free potions.

Updated November 14, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Fresh codes are now available, and we’ve included them here. Don’t wait too long to redeem them.

All Transform VS Sword Simulator Codes

Working Transform VS Sword Simulator Codes

  • DFS103 - Enter this code to get Potions. (NEW)
  • BHG42 - Enter this code to get Potions. (NEW)
  • act333 - Enter this code to get 9000 Ghosts and Turn Tickets. (NEW)
  • BGF21 - Enter this code to get Potions and Turn Tickets.
  • WIN1000 - Enter this code to get Potions and Turn Tickets.
  • FCL668 - Enter this code to get Potions and Turn Tickets.
  • QF668 - Enter this code to get Turn Tickets.
  • F5J3M7N8PQ - Enter this code to get 3 Exp Potion, 3 Gold Potion, and 3 Diamond Potion.
  • joindiscord - Enter this code to get 5 XP Potion, 5 Gold Potion, and 5 Diamond Potion.
  • tvs666 - Enter this code to get a Dandelion pet.

Expired Transform VS Sword Simulator Codes

At the moment, Transform VS Sword Simulator does not have any expired codes, but if they appear, we will add them here.

How to Redeem Codes in Transform VS Sword Simulator

Roblox codes give players good rewards, which makes progress faster and more enjoyable. This positively impacts games, so developers make the redemption function clear and accessible. Therefore, you can usually redeem codes in the settings, in the store, or directly in the interface, as is the case with Transform VS Sword Simulator . However, there are a lot of different buttons in the UI, which can be confusing for some players. To help them, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Transform VS Sword Simulator .

  • Open Roblox and launch Transform VS Sword Simulator .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. Find and click the Code button with the Discord logo.
  • In the white field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Verify.

Remember that you can only get rewards for an active code, so redeem it before it expires.

How to Get More Transform VS Sword Simulator Codes

Codes in different Roblox games always give cool rewards, but they are difficult to find. Usually, codes are available on developer social media pages, but even there, the information may be outdated. If you're tired of wasting time searching for working codes, bookmark this guide in your browser. We update the information regularly, so you can always get free currency or boosters. If you still want to visit the social networks of the Transform VS Sword Simulator developers, you can find them at the links below:

  • Transform VS Sword Simulator Discord server

How to Redeem Codes in Treasure Quest

Redeeming codes in Treasure Quest is a simple task, but players still need to do a few things, which makes the process a little different from most other Roblox games. Those having trouble can read the step-by-step instructions below. It is also important to note that to redeem codes, it is necessary to reach level 5:

  • Open Roblox and launch Treasure Quest .
  • Click or tap the house icon on the right side of the screen.
  • Then click or tap the Twitter button.
  • Players must follow @NosniyRBLX and @Sensei RBX on Twitter in order to redeem codes.
  • Sometimes, it is better to wait up to five minutes after this step.
  • After that, enter the name of the Twitter profile that was used to subscribe in the field.
  • Then players can redeem the codes.

Treasure Quest Tips and Tricks

Below, players will find some tips and tricks for leveling up fast in Treasure Quest :

  • Choose the mage class and focus on obtaining Earthquake and Wave Blaster spells.
  • Look for equipment with higher power levels to enhance abilities.
  • Trade and buy rare equipment from the shop after reaching level 15.
  • Use Ice Spikes for bosses and Earthquake for dungeons.
  • Progress through dungeons one by one, and with these strategies, reach levels 80-100 in 8-9 hours, especially during double XP events.

The Best Roblox RPG Like Treasure Quest

Although this game offers an interesting gaming experience, most players will eventually find themselves growing tired of it. In such cases, this article has a list of five of the best games like Treasure Quest . These games are great alternatives and are well worth checking out:

  • World Zero
  • Dragon Adventures
  • Blade Quest
  • Dungeon Quest!
  • RPG Simulator

About the Treasure Quest Developers

Treasure Quest was developed by the Nosniy Games development team. Their Roblox group already has more than 6 million members. Here is a list of their other games:

  • Super Golf!
  • Noodle Arms
  • Black Hole Simulator
  • Halloween Simulator

item.title: Roblox: Cultivation of Realm Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Cultivation of Realm is a well-made, enjoyable fantasy RPG with an open world and a linear storyline, perfect for a break from the more dynamic and action-packed Roblox games. Here, you take the role of a monk, improve your abilities, and increase your Qi level to overcome enemies that will get in your way.

By redeeming Cultivation of Realm codes, you will receive generous rewards that will help you progress in the game and improve your character much faster and easier. Each code offers useful rewards such as currency or other resources that will definitely come in handy, so don't neglect it.

Updated November 14, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've added a lot of codes in this update. Hurry up and redeem them because no one knows when the developers will decide to expire them.

All Cultivation of Realm Codes

Working Cultivation of Realm Codes

  • SorryforBugs - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards (NEW)
  • SorryForBugs2 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards (NEW)

Redeeming Cultivation of Realm codes will be especially useful for beginners and inactive players. The rewards you get will be a great initial boost, so be sure to take advantage of this benefit.

How to Redeem Codes for Cultivation of Realm

Fortunately, Cultivation of Realm 's redemption system is simple and quite common among other Roblox games, so experienced players shouldn't have any problems getting rewards. Still, if you're a beginner or don't know how the redemption system works specifically in Cultivation of Realm , here's a detailed guide:

  • Launch Cultivation of Realm .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be a button with three dashes on the icon. Click on it.
  • After doing so, you will see several more buttons with different icons on the screen. Among them, find and interact with the one that says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will not see any notification, but the rewards will be credited to your account.
